import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-contact', templateUrl: './contact.component.html', styleUrls: ['./contact.component.css'] }) export class ContactComponent { }

Contact Us

Here you can find more information about where our car parks are located and all the ways how you can reach us!

Contact Us Or Use This Form To Rent A Car

This form will help you to reach us faster. Our supports are available 24/7. You can call us anytime!

Contact Info

  • Address: 34 Street Name, City Name Here, Bulgaria
  • Phone:+359 288 5321 444
  • Email:isomeone@yahooooo.som
